channel.title: Carlos M. G. on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Carlos M. G. on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: NGC1818 unveils the origin of the extended main-sequence turn-off in young Magellanic Clouds clusters
item.description: The turn-on in the 40 Myr-old cluster NGC1818 exclude the presence of possible age differences among cluster stars, unveiling the origin of the extended main-sequence turn-off in young Magellanic Clouds clusters

item.title: Multiple stellar populations along the red Horizontal Branch and Red Clump of Globular Clusters
item.description: Multiple stellar populations along the red Horizontal Branch and Red Clump of Globular Clusters
